scripts.p_test: npm run parcel-build-css && npm run parcel-build-js
scripts.p_dev: parcel            resources/test/**/source_style.scss --out-dir resources/test --out-file style.css resources/test/**/source_script.js --out-dir resources/test --out-file script,js --no-source-maps
scripts.p_build: parcel build resources/test/**/source_style.scss resources/test/**/source_script.js --out-file style.css script.js --no-source-maps
scripts.p_watch: parcel watch    resources/test/**/source_style.scss --out-dir resources/test --out-file style.css resources/test/**/source_script.js --out-dir resources/test --out-file script,js --no-source-maps
